mapper.select:
SELECT A.OrderNo, A.PayFlg, A.OrderSeq, A.CreatedTime, T.ChName, T.PyName, T.Remarks, T.VoucherUrl, P.PriceCN, P.PriceEN, P.PayStyle, S.AccountName, S.ChName, S.EnName, S.AccountNo, B.Text AS UnitText, FinishFlg, S.BankAddress, S.BIC, S.Country FROM tb_order A JOIN tb_user U ON A.UserID = U.ID LEFT JOIN tb_school S ON A.SchoolID = S.ID JOIN tb_student T ON A.StudentID = T.ID JOIN tb_pay P ON A.PayID = P.ID LEFT JOIN tb_basicdict B ON S.Country = B.`Code` WHERE U.ID = #{userId}
AND FinishFlg = 4
AND FinishFlg != 4
ORDER BY A.CreatedTime DESC

SELECT A.OrderNo, A.PayFlg, A.OrderSeq, A.CreatedTime, P.PayStyle, U.Email, U.Telphone, U.Name UserName, T.ChName, T.PyName, T.Remarks, T.CardNo, T.VoucherUrl, P.PriceCN, P.PriceEN, P.EndDate, S.AccountName, S.ChName, S.EnName, S.AccountNo, S.Location, B.Text AS UnitText, B.Name AS currencyType, B.Mark AS currencyMark, FinishFlg, S.BankName, S.BankAddress, S.BIC, S.Country FROM tb_order A JOIN tb_user U ON A.UserID = U.ID LEFT JOIN tb_school S ON A.SchoolID = S.ID LEFT JOIN tb_basicdict B ON S.Country = B.`Code` JOIN tb_student T ON A.StudentID = T.ID JOIN tb_pay P ON A.PayID = P.ID WHERE A.OrderNo = #{id}
